stable.title: Announcing ImageGlass 9.1.7.627 - In Brussels
stable.description: This release brings back ARM64 build, fixes some issues including ImageGlass could not run when user adds Inkscape system PATH.

kobe.title: Announcing ImageGlass 9.1.7.627 - In Brussels
kobe.description:
This release brings back ARM64 build, fixes some issues including ImageGlass could not run when user adds Inkscape system PATH.
⚠️ Note: Some version 8 features ARE NOT available, please read the blog post before upgrading.
